data.summary_suggestion: Update exchange rate currency pair visibility
data.description_suggestion: Updates the visibility status of a currency pair exchange rate. Accepts a CurrencyPairUpdate request containing the currency pair and visibility setting. Controls whether the exchange rate is visible in the system. Returns the updated exchange rate configuration. This operation modifies the visibility state of the specified currency pair.
data.reasoning: Operation has no summary or description. Added clear action verb, specified what is being updated (visibility of currency pair), clarified input requirements (CurrencyPairUpdate schema), explained the effect (controls visibility in system), and indicated return value for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'patch-/settings/v3/currencies/exchange-rates/{exchangeRateId}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary and description. Added clear action verb (update), specified what is being modified (multiplier value), clarified the partial update behavior, explained the required parameter, and indicated the return value for AI agent clarity.

data.description_suggestion: Partially updates an exchange rate record by modifying its multiplier value. Accepts an ExchangeRateMultiplier request containing the new multiplier. Only the multiplier field is updated; other exchange rate properties remain unchanged. Returns the updated ExchangeRate object. Requires the exchangeRateId path parameter to identify the target exchange rate.
data.reasoning: Missing summary and description. Added clear action verb (update), specified what is being modified (multiplier value), clarified the partial update behavior, explained the required parameter, and indicated the return value for AI agent clarity.

message: Operation 'post-/settings/v3/currencies/exchange-rates/batch/create' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. No summary or description provided. Added batch operation context, specified input format (array of exchange rates), clarified dual response scenarios (201 for full success, 207 for partial), explained partial success behavior, and indicated this is for bulk operations to help AI agents understand when to use this versus single-record creation.

data.summary_suggestion: Create multiple exchange rates in batch
data.description_suggestion: Creates multiple exchange rate records in a single batch operation. Accepts a BatchInputExchangeRateCreateRequest containing an array of exchange rates to create. Returns a BatchResponseExchangeRate (201) on full success or BatchResponseExchangeRateWithErrors (207) if some records failed. Enables efficient bulk creation of exchange rates with partial success handling. Individual record failures do not prevent other records from being created.
data.reasoning: No summary or description provided. Added batch operation context, specified input format (array of exchange rates), clarified dual response scenarios (201 for full success, 207 for partial), explained partial success behavior, and indicated this is for bulk operations to help AI agents understand when to use this versus single-record creation.
